bizModel.ListSQL: select * from (select *,dbo.WF_GetActiveNodeByAppId(_AutoId) ActiveNode,dbo.WF_GetActiveEmployeeByAppId(_AutoID) ActiveEmployee from OA_QINGJIA) t where |^condition^| |^sortdir^|

TableScript.ScriptNote: 寒暑假请假申请是否有效
肝病研究所的请假时间计算

TableScript.ScriptTxt: select YEAR(GETDATE()) date,isnull(sum(SummerLeave),0) SummerLeave, [dbo].[ConvertMinutesToDays](isnull(sum(SurpSummerLeave),0)) SurpSummerLeave from (select top 1 isnull(SummerLeave,0) SummerLeave,isnull(SurpSummerLeave,0) SurpSummerLeave from HR_B_SummerLeave where date=YEAR(GETDATE()) and EmpNo='@empNo' order by _createtime desc) a
select count(*) from HR_B_Dept_Manager where ','+PositiveDirector +',' like '%,' + (select employeecode from T_E_Org_Employee where EmployeeCode='@EmployeeCode')+',%'

select distinct empno from ( select empno from HR_B_Formal_Unit_Emp a inner join HR_B_Formal_Unit b on a._MainID =b._AutoID where Managementname like '北京大学肝病研究所%' and a.EmpNo='@EmpNo' union select empno from HR_B_contract_Unit_Emp a inner join HR_B_contract_Unit b on a._MainID =b._AutoID where Managementname like '北京大学肝病研究所%' and a.EmpNo='@EmpNo')a
TableScript.ScriptNote: 是否属于北京大学肝病研究所考勤管理单元
生成请假明细肝病研究所
查询选定的值班记录可休的小时数
生成值班调休可休时间列表

TableScript.ScriptTxt: update HR_B_SummerLeave set SurpSummerLeave = (select SurpSummerLeave -isnull(b.leavedays,0) from HR_B_SummerLeave a left join OA_QINGJIA_summerleave b on a._AutoID =b.summerleaveid where a.EmpNo ='@empNO' and b._mainid='@mainID')

select YEAR(GETDATE())-1 date,isnull(sum(SummerLeave),0) SummerLeave, [dbo].[ConvertMinutesToDays](isnull(sum(SurpSummerLeave),0)) SurpSummerLeave from (select top 1 isnull(SummerLeave,0) SummerLeave,isnull(SurpSummerLeave,0) SurpSummerLeave from HR_B_SummerLeave where date=YEAR(GETDATE())-1 and EmpNo='@empNo' and GETDATE()<cast(YEAR(GETDATE()) as varchar)+'-'+(select CLEARDATE from T_BC_SUMMERLEAVE_CLEARDATE) order by _createtime desc) a

select count(*) from oa_qingjia where EMPLOYN0 ='@empNo' and ( ('@begintimeStr' >STARTDATE and '@begintimeStr'<ENDDATE ) or ('@endtimeStr' >STARTDATE and '@endtimeStr'<ENDDATE) or ('@begintimeStr'<=STARTDATE and '@endtimeStr'>=ENDDATE)) and _autoID<>'@autoID' and _isdel=0 and (_wfstate='处理中' or _wfstate='完成')
TableScript.ScriptNote: 检查是否有重合的请假申请
上一年寒暑假是否有效

TableScript.ScriptTxt: select YEAR(GETDATE())+1 date,isnull(sum(SummerLeave),0) SummerLeave, [dbo].[ConvertMinutesToDays](isnull(sum(SurpSummerLeave),0)) SurpSummerLeave from (select top 1 isnull(SummerLeave,0) SummerLeave,isnull(SurpSummerLeave,0) SurpSummerLeave from HR_B_SummerLeave where date=YEAR(GETDATE())+1 and EmpNo='@empNo' order by _createtime desc) a
select isnull(sum(isnull(SurpSummerLeave,0)),0) SurpSummerLeave from HR_B_SummerLeave where date='@year' and EmpNo='@empNo'
TableScript.ScriptNote: 查询员工指定年份的剩余寒暑假
